mapper.select: SELECT TSU.* FROM tb_user tsu WHERE 1=1 and tsu.companyId=#{companyId} (tsu.USERID = #{id} or tsu.bind_mobile=#{id})
SELECT TSU.* FROM tb_user tsu WHERE tsu.USERID = #{userid}
SELECT TSU.* FROM tb_user tsu WHERE tsu.accountid=#{accountid} and tsu.openid=#{openid}
SELECT DISTINCT VSRM.MENUID, VSRM.MENUITEM, VSRM.PARENTID, VSRM.URL, vsrm.nsort FROM VIEW_SYS_ROLE_MENU vsrm WHERE vsrm.PARENTID = '0' order by vsrm.nsort
SELECT DISTINCT sf.url FROM tb_user sur JOIN tb_sys_role_func srf ON SUR.ROLEID = SRF.ROLEID JOIN tb_sys_func sf ON sf.funcid = srf.funcid where SUR.USERID=#{userid}

SELECT T.Orgid FROM tb_org_info T where orgid in
#{ids.orgid}
SELECT toi.* FROM tb_user_org T join tb_org_info toi on t.orgid=toi.orgid where t.userid=#{userid}
